name: swaggeringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an extremely confident way that shows you think you are very important: He is swaggeringly confident. See
swagger
More examplesFewer examplesSwaggeringly dominant, awesomely powerful and quite probably the most destructive batsman the game has seen.Eunice found herself in a nightmare when she became attracted to the swaggeringly confident Allen.He swaggeringly revels in once again becoming the focus of international debate.
